nodes.text: Oora was a female Ithorian and mother of Pypey. Three years before the Battle of Yavin, The Fifth Brother and Seventh Sister Inquisitors were tasked with hunting down Force-sensitive children. The pair made their way to Oora's home, as the Ithorian's baby, Pypey, was Force-sensitive. Thanks to some quick thinking, Oora sent Pypey away with a family droid, and the Ghost crew later saved the child from the Empire.
Prior to being rescued by members of the rebel Phoenix Cell, Oora lived with her son in the Hammertown district of Takobo City - the capital of the planet Takobo.
